elements.label: Mortal
elements.description: One of the mundane. A mortal. Just like us.

elements.label: Summoned
elements.description: Something which did not originate in this plane of existence. Something which has been brought here. Likely against it's will

elements.label: HQ
elements.description: A corner of the library that can be used as a home, of sorts.

elements.label: Librarian
elements.description: One of the uncountable number of libarians inhabiting the library
